item.title: Killer Arrows
item.description: Deadly Arrows Info This sudoku is still in testing as I need people to test solve it. If you successfully test solve it, please get in contact so I know.

item.title: Pipes
item.description: Pipes Info This is an easier puzzle that I set. I initially made the puzzle quite difficult, but was forced weaken it a bit to disambiguate it at the end.

item.title: Rings
item.description: Rings Info This is the first sudoku I ever attempted setting. It is a moderately difficult sudoku that combines [[tutorials/Killer|killer]] and [[tutorials/Arrow|arrow]] (and [[tutorials/Kropki|kropki]]) variants.
